name: campgroundprobe_repo
description: By applying the knowledge from the web dev courses I took, I created this Web App called **CampgroundProbe**, where it is possible to share, search and view campgrounds around Brazil (similar to airbnb). This application has a full  CRUD operations Implemented, it also has authentication and the user can register their own campground. The provided address is converted to latitude and long longitude and plotted in a map through geocoding. Note that the presented campgrounds are fictional and created just for practice.
author: Bruno Campos
